name: Strategy Out of Control
description:
Strategy Out of Control is an RTS game but you are not able to control your units. Your mission is to send out your soldiers on missions and defeat all enemies before the timer runs out and a large bomb detonates. You have ten minutes. Good luck!

This game was created for the GMKT 2020 Game Jam.
Instructions
(Read before playing since there is no in game instructions/tutorial)
Objective
Defeat all enemies before the timer runs out. You do this by sending out soldiers to different locations. 
Mission Terminal
Walk up to the mission terminal to view your soldiers. You can cycle through your squads and send them away on a mission. You can send them to one of three locations (A, B, or C). When a mission has been completed, the remaining soldiers return to the base and can be sent out on a new mission. 


Map Terminal
Walk up to the map terminal to see what your soldiers are doing. You can cycle through the different locations to monitor multiple missions that are taking place at the same time.

Mission Terminal UI
Most of your actions are made this window. 

Your Squad can be seen here. Each soldier has different stats which is good to take in consideration when deciding what squad to send to a mission.


You can cycle through all of your squads using the up and down arrows. 


Sending a squad on a mission is done with the top most buttons (A, B, and C are the different locations). On the right is an indicator that displays if a squad is ready for a new mission or already on a mission. 


Map Terminal UI
When accessing the map terminal, you can cycle through the different maps using the buttons on the bottom left. The letter tells you what map you are currently looking at.


Tips
You can send out multiple squads to different missions at the same time. You can also send out multiple squads to the same location.  

Controls
Move with W, A, S, and D
Walk up to a terminal to access it and walk away when you are done. 

Made by BatoRoy.

All music and audio comes from ProductionCrate: https://www.productioncrate.com

Browser version of Strategy Out of Control that didn't compile in time to be published before the deadline: https://batoroy.itch.io/strategy-out-of-control-web
